column1: KPI DASHBOARD TEMPLATE - Business Now by Loud Legacy
Instructions: Track up to 10 KPIs weekly or monthly. Focus on metrics that drive decisions.
Choose 3-5 KPIs that matter most to your business. Quality over quantity.
Reference list - choose what matters to YOUR business
1. Actionable - You can influence the number
2. Timely - You can measure it frequently enough to act
3. Relevant - It connects to business outcomes
4. Simple - Anyone can understand what it means
5. Owned - Someone is responsible for moving it
Ask these questions when reviewing your KPIs:
1. What moved significantly this week? Why?
2. What's trending in the wrong direction?
3. What action will we take based on these numbers?
4. Are we measuring the right things?
